text:
Berkeley, CA ~ Developer Intern at Magoosh (http://magoosh.com/jobs/mobile-developer-intern/)

Us: A small team of 8 wise-crackers bringing online test prep to the world with 10s of thousands of happy students and an office in downtown Berkeley, one block east of BART.

You: A friendly budding programmer interested in shipping code and expanding Magooshâ€™s web, Android and/or iOS apps
